price: Así [como en las revelaciones anteriores] he revelado versículos claros, porque Dios guía a quien quiere.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِۭ بَيِّنَٰتٖ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَهۡدِي مَن يُرِيدُ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika anzalnāhu āyātin bayyinātin wa-anna al-laha yahdī man yurīdu
